item.title: Python Simple DI
item.description: python-simple-di is a simple dependency injection container implementation. With its help you can create instances and its dependencies on runtime. Changes 1.6.0 resolve many: the new methods resolve_many and resolve_many_lazy gives you the possibility to resolve multiple objects depending on their class. alias names: you can provide a list of alias names within the object configuration. constructor/factory (kw)argument overridies: resolve methods noch accepts args and kwargs that will can be used instead of args configurations.
